notes: The True Sight is provided within the whole area, regardless of the carrier's actual vision. It is fully unobstructed.
The True Sight is provided by an aura which affects enemies. Its debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Cannot detect units under the effect of Shadow Dance, Smoke of Deceit and Techies' mines under the effect of an Aghanim's Scepter upgraded Minefield Sign.
True Sight does not work when the Eye is in the inventory of a courier or Spirit Bear.
abilities.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier.

info: The Third Eye loses a charge upon dying. Once all charges are used up, the item is destroyed.
